lib.api.member 源代码

# coding: utf-8
import requests
import json
import pytest
from generic import Generic as g


[文档]class Member(object):
    '''
    会员模块相关接口
    '''


[文档]    def member_list(self,conf):
        '''
        客户列表
        '''
        url = "/member/list-ajax"
        return g.post_requests(conf,url,page=True)



[文档]    def member_detail(self,conf,id):
        '''
        客户详情
        '''
        url = "/member/member-detail-ajax"
        return g.post_requests(conf,url,id=id)



[文档]    def members_list(self,conf):
        '''
        会员列表
        '''
        url = "/members/list-ajax"
        return g.post_requests(conf,url,page=True)

[文档]    def member_group_list(self,conf):
        '''
        客户分组列表

[文档]    def member_group_add(self,conf,data):
        '''
        客户分组列表
        '''
        url = "/member/group-add-ajax"
        return g.post_requests(conf,url,data=data)



[文档]    def member_group_del(self,conf,id):
        '''
        删除客户分组
        注：该接口暂无效，待确认
        '''
        url = "/member/group-del-ajax"
        return g.post_requests(conf,url,id=id)



[文档]    def member_last_count(self,conf):

[文档]    def member_point_list(self,conf):

[文档]    def members_order_list(self,conf,id):
        '''
        客户消费记录
        '''
        url = "/members/find-member-order-list-ajax"
        data = {"_page":1,"_page_size":20,"uid":id}
        return g.post_requests(conf,url,data=data)

        会员卡投放统计
        '''
        url = "/members/member-card-statistics-ajax"
        return g.post_requests(conf,url,page=True)



[文档]    def members_offline(self,conf):
        '''
        实体店会员统计
        '''
        url = "/members/offline-ajax"
        data = {"_page":1,"_page_size":20}
        return g.post_requests(conf,url,data=data)

        '''
        标签管理
        '''
        url = "/members/add-tag-ajax"
        return g.post_requests(conf,url,data=data)



[文档]    def members_find_tag_ajax(self,conf):
        '''
        标签列表
        '''
        url = "/members/find-tag-ajax"
        data = {"_page_size":15,"_page":1}
        return g.post_requests(conf,url,data=data)




############################# 会员卡 ###############################

[文档]    def get_grade_ajax(self,conf,points):
        '''
        获取等级信息
        '''
        url = "/members/get-grade-ajax"
        data = {"growth": points}
        return g.post_requests(conf,url,data=data)

        '''
        会员折扣优惠共享设置

        url = "/members/edit-shop-member-setting-ajax"
